Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Milestones.Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

Title: Authorizes the empire state development corporation to rescind any approved general project plan for non-compliance
Summary: Authorizes the empire state development corporation to rescind any approved general project plan for non-compliance with any agreements made as part of such general project plan, including, but not limited to, community benefits agreements.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize the empire state development corporation to rescind any approved general project plan for non-compliance with agreements made thereto
